templates.name: Physical Store
templates.content: Currently, we don't have an Alabaster store. However, our book is available through various distributors.

templates.name: Do you still offer subscriptions?
templates.content: Yes, we do offer a monthly subscription but for the new Prayer Journal only. You can check it out here: https://www.alabasterco.com/products/the-prayer-journal

templates.name: Do you have all the books of the Bible?
templates.content: We do not have all the books of the Bible complete yet. As a small team, it takes us about 4-6 months to create each book. If you have any requests for our next book, please contact us at help@alabasterco.com.

templates.name: What does the Inspiration Collection include?
templates.content: The Inspiration Collection includes Psalms, Proverbs, Job, Song of Songs, Ecclesiastes, and our Notecard Collection.

templates.name: What does the Evergreen Collection include?
templates.content: The Evergreen Collection includes Psalms, Proverbs, Matthew, Mark, Luke, John, and our brand new Matte Sage Bookmark.

templates.name: Do you have new or gently used books?
templates.content: Our Made New sustainability event (selling gently read books) has concluded for now but we hope to offer it again in the future.

templates.name: I'm looking at your set, why is there a particular book missing?
templates.content: We hope to release all 66 books eventually but because our team is small and we want to make sure each book is as beautiful as it can be, our new releases take time. We appreciate your patience on this!

templates.name: Do you have the book of Joshua in hardcover?
templates.content: Currently, we only have the Book of Joshua in softcover. You can check it out here: https://www.alabasterco.com/products/the-book-of-joshua?utm_campaign=&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=pYAhs

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.alabasterco.com/pages/stockists-stores

templates.name: Retroactive discount
templates.content: You can email us at help@alabasterco.com to check if it will be possible to add the discount retroactively.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/alabaster_co/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/alabasterco

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.alabasterco.com/pages/returns

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest in bulk ordering with Alabaster. Please fill out the interest form - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeFiV5wIhdcj7lT7iSE5e4Uy9Gm1Od5FNxhkwrVkds8iqeUxg/viewform and we will respond to your request within one business day. Also note that a Google account is required to apply.

templates.name: Shipping costs
templates.content: Standard shipping is $6 or free for US orders of $80 or more. There are faster shipping options that are calculated at checkout.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at help@alabasterco.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2-3 business days and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, and FedEx. Our Standard Shipping takes 4-7 business days transit time for $7.00 or free over $80. For Faster Shipping, it takes 2-3 business days transit time. This starts at $15 and is calculated based on weight of order.

templates.name: Do you include receipts in your packages?
templates.content: We never include receipts in our boxes precisely because people gift our books so often.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at help@alabasterco.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Customer replies with 2+ numbers/letters for Concierge journeys
templates.content: Thanks for your message. Please respond with a single number/letter to get your personalized exclusive content.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at help@alabasterco.com with your order number. Someone from our team will be happy to help you with this.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We do offer free shipping on US orders over $80! Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Post purchase issues
templates.content: Great question! Please email us directly at help@alabasterco.com with your order number. Someone from our team will be happy to help you with this.

templates.name: Do you offer gift wrap/packaging?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't offer gift packaging but if it helps to know, we don't include receipts in our packages as people gift our books so often and you'll have the option to add a gift message when you view your cart!

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://alabaster-co.happyreturns.com/

templates.name: Can I add a gift message to my order?
templates.content: Yes! Once you add an item to your cart you will see the option to add a gift message.

templates.name: When will I receive my refund?
templates.content: Please allow 10-14 business days for your refund to be processed after the return shipment has been received. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method on the order.

templates.name: Are you a Christian/Catholic company?
templates.content: No. We are a for-profit company that releases individual books of the Bible.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Difference between the bible study volume 1 and 2
templates.content: Each study explores 30 distinct stories, each in its own self-contained chapter. You don't have to read Volume 1 of The Good and Beautiful Bible Study before diving into Volume 2. Feel free to explore Volume 2 first or choose the order that suits you best.

templates.name: What bible versions do you offer?/Do you have the CSB version?
templates.content: All books are available in NLT. Select books are available in KJV, ESV, and NIV.

templates.name: Does the Complete Bible Collection include all the books from the Bible?
templates.content: Our Complete Collection does not include all the books of the bible. You can take a look at the books which are included here: https://www.alabasterco.com/products/the-complete-collection?utm_campaign=&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=9qhUE

templates.name: How do I redeem my points?
templates.content:
Redeeming your points is easy. During checkout just use the dropdown in your cart to apply one of the amounts below to any purchase over $50. 

$5-50 points
$10-100 points
$15-150 points
$20-200 points
$25-250 points

templates.name: Do you ship overseas?
templates.content: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply and will be added at checkout. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.
